statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT feedback_id, submission_date FROM user_feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_feedback
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY average_sentiment DESC;
SELECT submission_date, user_id FROM user_feedback WHERE DAY(submission_date) = 5 AND MONTH(submission_date) = 10 ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 3
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 10 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE category = 'Tech' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base WHERE category = 'Health' ORDER BY article_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT article_title, created_date FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_feedback > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data JOIN user_profiles ON feedback_data.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_message FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY article_title DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base WHERE create_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY create_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, feedback.feedback_message, feedback.feedback_date FROM feedback JOIN users ON feedback.user_id = users.user_id WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT knowledge_text, creation_date FROM KnowledgeBase ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_result FROM AnalysisResults WHERE feedback_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.analysis_result FROM UserProfiles u JOIN AnalysisResults a ON u.user_id = a.feedback_id WHERE a.analysis_type = 'sentiment';
SELECT k.knowledge_text, k.creation_date FROM KnowledgeBase k WHERE k.creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY k.creation_date;
SELECT s.sentiment_value, COUNT(*) FROM SentimentData s GROUP BY s.sentiment_value HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
